title: Double Trouble 2022: Panthers & Falcons
description:
Daniel Dopp, Mike Clay and Liz Loza tackle a Double Trouble on the Panthers and Falcons, including if you should use a Top 2 pick on CMC and if Kyle Pitts will break out this season. Then, the crew talks what rookie WR’s MUST be on your radar for your draft.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Field Yates, Stephania Bell, Mike Clay, Daniel Dopp
itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Focus: Is CMC Worth A Top 2 Pick, Is Kyle Pitts An Elite TE Yet?
